desc: We sell pantry items such as jams, jellies, honeys, syrups, drink mixers, elixirs, coffees, chocolates, Spices, sauces, olive oils, balsamic vinegars, pickles, olives and more! We focus on carrying smaller brands and brands that are women owned or brands that have a socially conscious platform.

layout.text: We Search the World for Spices, Sauces and Unique Ingredients.
